ConfigurationOption.Value: select t.ticketid, t.status, sd.maxvalue maxstatus, t.description, (select ldtext from longdescription where ldkey = t.ticketuid and ldownertable = 'TICKET' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') ldtext, t.assetnum, t.location, t.reportedpriority, t.reportdate, t.reportedby, t.affectedemail, t.affectedperson, t.affectedphone, t.owner, t.siteid, t.orgid,t.ticketuid from ticket t join synonymdomain sd on t.status = sd.value and sd.domainid = 'SRSTATUS' where t.status <> 'CLOSED'

Struct._value: := test( ${ticketuid} is not null, find( ${STATUS_TRANSITIONS}, '(' || ${Status} || '|' || ${Maximo Status} || ')' || '=([A-Z ,]*)', 2 ), null )

EventAction.Condition: ${Location} is not null and ${Asset} is not null and query( 'Assets', 'Location', 'Asset = ${Asset}' ) != ${Location}

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please enter a description for the service request

Struct._value: := nvl( query( "Synonym Domain", "Maximo Value", "Domain = SRSTATUS and Value = ${Status}" ), ${Status} )
